These terms and conditions are an agreement between you and Parenting for Lifelong Health (“PLH”) which furthermore sets out the rules for your use of  Mayor Konektá (or “App”).

Mayor Konektá is a free app version of the PLH programme and designed for facilitators delivering the Mayor Konektá programme.

Mayor Konektá is brought to you by the collaboration of partners including the Ministry of Social Development, Labour and Welfare (SOAW), UNICEF the Netherlands and IDEMS International. (‘ Mayor Konektá team’).

Please read these terms and conditions carefully. By downloading or using the App, you agree that you have read, understood, and accepted the terms and conditions contained below.

Your privacy is important to us – please also read our privacy policy, which will detail how we collect, store and use the information that you provide to us. Your rights under the National ordinance personal data protection can be found in our Privacy Policy. By using Mayor Konektá you are confirming to us that you reviewed our privacy policy, as set out separately.

Mayor Konektá is open-source, which means that its codebase can be found on GitHub for the wider software developer community. However, it's against the terms of use to alter the existing application or its materials, or to replicate any trademarks from the Mayor Konektá team. Although open source, refrain from translating the software into other languages or creating alternate versions without crediting the Mayor Konektá team. Ensure that your usage of the App adheres to all local rules and laws. This app is intended for adult users as a policy choice. If you are a minor, you should not use the app without the consent of your legal representative.

For that reason, we reserve the right to make changes to the App which will be delivered through updates. At present the App is free of charge and our intention is for it to stay that way. If any update substantially affects personal data processing, users will be notified in advance.

So that we can improve, any comments are not considered confidential and will become available for further lawful use without additional approval or compensation. We shall therefore own exclusive rights and believe any feedback that you have made is original by you. Your feedback will never be shared with your full name. Any feedback you submit is processed in accordance with applicable data protection laws and will not be linked to identifiable personal data unless strictly necessary.

Our App stores and processes personal data that you have provided to us, in order to offer our services. It is your responsibility to keep your phone and access to the App secure. Removal of software restrictions and limitations imposed by the official operating system of your device is therefore not recommended. Doing so could make your phone vulnerable to malware, viruses, malicious programs as well as compromise your phone’s security features and could mean that the App will not work properly or at all.
All data collected by the Mayor Konektá team is stored securely using encryption protocols and is accessible only to authorized personnel.
The Mayor Konektá team implements appropriate technical and organisational security measures as required by law.
Processing takes place based on performance of contract and legitimate interests, as further explained in our Privacy Policy.
To see how we handle your personal information, please see our @global.privacy_policy.
